001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.drivebase;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
006import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
007
008/** Class for mecanum/xdrive drivebases
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 * @param <T> The motor type for the subsystem
011 */
012public class SimpleMecanumDrivebaseSubsystem<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends DrivebaseSubsystem<T> {
013
014    /** Drive motors
015     *
016     */
017    public Motor<T> flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor;
018
019    /** Create mecanum drivebase
020     *
021     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
022     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
023     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
024     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
025     */
026    public SimpleMecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(Motor<T> flMotor, Motor<T> frMotor, Motor<T> rlMotor, Motor<T> rrMotor) {
027        super(flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
028        this.flMotor = flMotor;
029        this.frMotor = frMotor;
030        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
031        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
032    }
033
034    /** Create mecanum drivebase
035     *
036     * @param gyro The gyro supplier
037     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
038     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
039     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
040     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
041     */
042    public SimpleMecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(
043        DoubleSupplier gyro,
044        Motor<T> flMotor,
045        Motor<T> frMotor,
046        Motor<T> rlMotor,
047        Motor<T> rrMotor
048    ) {
049        super(gyro, flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
050        this.flMotor = flMotor;
051        this.frMotor = frMotor;
052        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
053        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
054    }
055
056    public void joystickDrive(double x, double y, double rotation) {
057        joystickDriveWithGyro(x, y, rotation, 0);
058    }
059
060    public void joystickDriveWithGyro(double x, double y, double rotation, double gyroAngle) {
061        double speed = Range.clip(Math.abs(Math.hypot(x, y)), 0, 1);
062        double headingRad = Math.toRadians(gyroAngle);
063        double angle = -Math.atan2(y, x) + headingRad - Math.PI / 4;
064        drive(speed, angle, rotation);
065    }
066
067    public void drive(double speed, double angle, double rotation) {
068        double x = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
069        double y = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
070
071        double powerCompY = -(x + y);
072        double powerCompX = x - y;
073
074        speed = Range.clip(speed + Math.abs(rotation), 0, 1);
075
076        double flPower = powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
077        double frPower = -powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
078        double rlPower = powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
079        double rrPower = -powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
080
081        double scale = getScale(flPower, frPower, rlPower, rrPower);
082        scale = scale == 0 ? 0 : speed / scale;
083        scale = Math.cbrt(scale);
084        drive(flPower * scale, frPower * scale, rlPower * scale, rrPower * scale);
085    }
086
087    public void stop() {
088        drive(0, 0, 0, 0);
089    }
090
091    public void drive(double flSpeed, double frSpeed, double rlSpeed, double rrSpeed) {
092        flMotor.setSpeed(flSpeed * getSpeed());
093        frMotor.setSpeed(frSpeed * getSpeed());
094        rlMotor.setSpeed(rlSpeed * getSpeed());
095        rrMotor.setSpeed(rrSpeed * getSpeed());
096    }
097}
